prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who spreads the earth upon the waters — ground me in stability.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 118:25: "Lord, save us! Lord, grant us success!"
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 13:11: "Wealth gained hastily will dwindle, but whoever gathers little by little will increase it."
prayer.intention: Let my work today compound into something that outlasts me.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai — Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.

weather.title: ☀️ Weather — Temecula
weather.summary: Cool, clear morning. Perfect for Sunday sweet breakfast on the patio.

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
family.suggestion: It's Sunday Sweet Breakfast day! Make pancakes shaped like Super Wings planes with Jones — he'll love helping pour the batter while Jett watches from his high chair.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: 'What book are you reading right now? I'd love to hear about it.'
family.weeklyGoal: Plan your February date night — Valentine's Day is in 13 days. Book a sitter and pick a spot.
family.potencyAction: Ask: 'What do you need from me right now?' and do it
family.reflection: ⚠️ Relationship temperature is CRITICAL (ratio: 1.5). Priority today: repair, not productivity. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending. Create space for Jillian to express frustrations. Presence > projects.

signals.rationale: RSI overbought (71.8), high volume, near BB resistance
